file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-42-03-04 - TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the taxi light contactors. B. These procedures are applicable to taxi light contactor 1 and taxi light contactor 2. C. Taxi light contactor 1 is installed in the LH Electrical-power control/distribution box and taxi light contactor 2 is installed in the RH Electrical-power control/distribution box. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-42-03-000-801-A TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR - REMOVAL TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR - INSTALLA- ALL 33-42-03-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-42-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-42-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the taxi light contactor. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223UZ LH cockpit/pax partition 224 224NZ RH cockpit/pax partition D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH or RH cockpit/pax partition I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is deenergized. (2) To get access to taxi light contactor 1 (LH electrical-power control/distribution box), remove the 223UZ access panel ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (3) To get access to taxi light contactor 2 (RH electrical-power control/distribution box), remove the 224NZ access panel ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector (9). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-42-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the nut (7) and washer (8) which attach the fuse (4) to the taxi light contactor (1). (3) Remove bolt (6) and the washer (5) which attach the fuse (4) to the electrical-power control/distribution box. (4) Remove the fuse (4). (5) Disconnect the electrical wire (11). For this, remove the nut (10) and washer (12). (6) Remove the four screws (3) and four washers (2) which attach the taxi light contactor (1) to the electrical power control/distribution box. (7) Remove the taxi light contactor (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-42-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Taxi Light Contactor - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE B C 224 223UZ 224NZ A ZONE 223 DET. A D UPPER TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR (K0235) D BOTTOM TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR (K0236) RH ELECTRICAL-POWER LH ELECTRICAL-POWER DET. B DET. C 1 10. NUT CONTROL/DISTRIBUTION CONTROL/DISTRIBUTION BOX BOX 11. ELECTRICAL WIRE 12. WASHER 1 TORQUE OF 2.6 TO 2.9 N.m(23 TO 26 lbf.in) 2 TORQUE OF 6.8 TO 7.9 N.m(60 TO 70 lbf.in) 1. TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR (K0235 OR K0236) 9. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2. WASHER (4) 8. WASHER 3. SCREW (4) 4. FUSE 1 5. WASHER 7. NUT DET. D 2 145AMM300145.MCE A 6. BOLT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-42-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-42-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. TAXI LIGHT CONTACTOR - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the taxi light contactor. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223UZ LH cockpit/pax partition 224 224NZ RH cockpit/pax partition D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Torque wrench To apply the necessary torque available E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task LH or RH cockpit/pax partition I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the taxi light contactor (1) in the electrical-power control/distribution box. (2) Tighten the four screws (3) and four washers (2) which attach the taxi light contactor (1) to the electrical-power control/distribution box. (3) Connect the electrical wire (11) with the washer (12) and nut (10). (4) Put the fuse (4) in its installation position. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-42-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Tighten the washer (8) and the nut (7) which attach the fuse (4) to the taxi light contactor (1). (6) Tighten the bolt (6) and the washer (5) which attach the fuse (4) to the electrical-power control/distribution box. (7) Connect the electrical connector (9). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the 223UZ or 224NZ access panel ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100), and install the lifevest shroud assembly (as applicable). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-42-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
